dealer.about: Blyth Trailer Sales is a class 8 semi trailer dealership located just outside of St. Louis, MO. We buy and sell trailers all over the United States and Canada. We offer a wide selection of flatbeds, drop decks, dry vans, lowboys, and much more from popular brands including Manac, Dorsey Trailer, and XL Specialized Trailers. We also offer competitive financing through BMO Harris, Hitachi, Wells Fargo, and more.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY 53' x 102" All Aluminum Flatbed with Aero Conestoga
listings.description: NEW 2026 Dorsey 53'x102" All Aluminum Flatbeds with Aero Conestoga sliding tarp. Features include: Bulkhead access door, Quad uplift bows for reduced tarp sag, Air ride suspension with rear axle slide CA legal, All aluminum 22.5 wheels, Coil package, Winch track with 12 sliding winches. Price includes FET and is FOB Valley Park (St. Louis), MO.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY 45' x 102" Steel Flatbed with Forklift Kit
listings.description: New 2026 Dorsey 45'x102" steel flatbeds with forklift kit. Features include: Hendrickson INTRAAX 23k air ride suspension, Universal MT lift hauler, Heavy duty construction for equipment hauling.

listings.title: 2024 DORSEY 53' x 102" All Aluminum Flatbed with Aero Conestoga
listings.description: NEW 2024 Dorsey 53'x102" All Aluminum Flatbeds with Aero Conestoga sliding tarp. Features include: Bulkhead access door, Quad uplift bows for reduced tarp sag, Air ride suspension with rear axle slide CA legal.

listings.title: 2024 DORSEY 53' x 102" Combo Flatbed
listings.description: NEW 2024 Dorsey 53'x102" combo flatbeds. Features include: Hendrickson Intraax air ride suspension, Rear axle slide CA legal, 30" king pin setting, Aluminum floor and siderails, 12" x-member spacing.

listings.title: 2024 DORSEY 48' x 102" Combo Flatbed Spread Axle
listings.description: NEW 2024 Dorsey 48'x102" combo flatbeds. Features include: Hendrickson Intraax air ride suspension, Spread axle configuration, 30" king pin setting, Aluminum floor and siderails.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY 53' Steel Drop Deck Air Ride Spread
listings.description: NEW 2026 Dorsey 53' steel drop decks with air ride spread. Features include: Apitong floor, Winch track and winches on driver's side, Steel wheels on LP22.5 tires.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY 53' x 102" All Aluminum Drop Deck
listings.description: NEW 2026 Dorsey 53'x102" all aluminum drop decks. Features include: Galvanized air ride suspension, Rear axle slide (CA legal), Coil package, 11' upper deck.

listings.title: 2025 MANAC Darkwing 53' x 102" All Aluminum Drop Deck
listings.model: Darkwing 53' x 102" All Aluminum Drop Deck
listings.description: New 2025 Manac Darkwing 53'x102" all aluminum drop decks. Features include: Hendrickson intraax air ride suspension, Rear axle slide, All aluminum wheels, Winch track.

listings.title: 2024 MANAC 53' x 102" Combo Drop Deck
listings.description: New 2024 Manac 53'x102" Combo Drop Deck. Features include: Hendrickson intraax air ride suspension, Rear axle slide, Aluminum floor and side rails, Coil package.

listings.title: 2024 BRAZOS 53' Combo Drop Deck
listings.description: 2024 Brazos 53' combo drop decks. Features include: Air ride suspension, Rear axle slide California legal, Full ramp kit, Tool boxes, Winch track. 10 units available.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY 55 Ton Hydraulic RGN Lowboy
listings.description: NEW 2026 Dorsey 55 ton hydraulic RGN lowboys. Features include: Honda pony motor, 102" swing clearance, 53' overall length, 25' well, 22" loaded deck height, Apitong floor covering.

listings.title: 2026 DORSEY LB35-33CS 35 Ton Fixed Neck Lowboy
listings.description: New 2026 Dorsey LB35-33CS 35 ton fixed neck lowboy, contractor special neck. Specifications: 45'4" x 102", 33" loaded deck height, 27' main deck, 8'6" upper deck.

listings.title: 2025 XL SPECIALIZED 35 Ton Lowboy
listings.description: XL Specialized 35 ton lowboy trailer. Features include: 35 ton payload capacity, 53 ft length, 102 in width, Wood floor.
